title: Studente Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Grande colloquio in cui sono stato molto apprezzato. Personale qualificato esperto e competente. Consiglio a tutti di provare a fare application presso il polito. Torino bella città e offre moltissime opportunità
Interview Questions: Esperienze precedenti e motivazioni per la carica

title: Assegnista Di Ricerca Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin)
Interview Descriptions: Si tratta di un concorso pubblico con valutazione titoli ed esame orale riguardante le tematiche dell'assegno, con bandi all'interno del sito universitario. La laurea è requisito per partecipare al concorso
Interview Questions: Domande riguardanti le tematiche dell'assegno di ricerca

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin)
Interview Descriptions: Smooth and short interview procedure. They give a 15 mins for the interview and ask some general questions. Also, they ask a couple of technical questions regarding the project which the candidate will work on.
Interview Questions: Technical questions related to ongoing projects and expectations

title: Dottorando Di Ricerca Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Richiesta conoscenza generale degli argomenti della borsa, nonché dimostrazione di motivazione. È richiesta una descrizione dettagliata della tesi magistrale. Il punteggio di ammissione dipende anche da pubblicazioni, voto di laurea.
Interview Questions: Non ci sono domande specifiche e ricorrenti, perché dipende tutto dalla borsa per cui si concorre.

title: Engineer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Conoscitivo, giusto qualche domanda perché ero un ex studente. Ad esempio: perché vorresti continuare a fare ricerca? Cosa ti piace di questo gruppo? Sei una persona capace di lavorare in team? Ti piacciono o ti affascinano le sfide? Come ti vedi fra 5 anni? Perché non hai optato per un percorso in azienda?
Interview Questions: Perché ti sei candidato? Sai lavorare in team?

title: Master Thesis Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Plenty of interesting projects there, but the internships are not paid. It's better for dedicated students who want to pursue a PhD. Very good professors and good advancement for science
Interview Questions: Explained the project, asked about my experience

title: Assistente Laboratorio Chimica Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Domande generiche riguardo agli studi e sui principali argomenti della chimica organica e inorganica. Particolare attenzione per esperienze di laboratorio pregresse, conoscenza della strumentazione e delle principali misure di sicurezza.
Interview Questions: Come scritto sopra nel box informativo

title: Engineering Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: I set on a chair and they ask me what i was doing there so i declined the offer that they made but i was not so confidente about myself so i came back to ask again tho get a new offer and they said no again
Interview Questions: How are u? Why are u here?

title: Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Ho dovuto far trasparire la mia passione e le mie conoscenze nell’ambito del progetto di cui poi mi sarei andato ad occupare. Sono state valutate principalmente la motivazione e le esperienze pratiche apprese nel mio passato
Interview Questions: Perchè vuoi ricoprire questo ruolo?

title: Tesista Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Chiamata tramite zoom, mi ha chiesto un po' di me e per quale motivo volessi fare la tesi, e per quale motivo il professore avrebbe dovuto scegliere me come tesista
Interview Questions: Laboratori fatti durante l'anno,  competenze generali

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was good although language was a problem . Since I was a student in this university it wasn’t something too difficult for me they definitely prefer hiring from students
Interview Questions: Questions and motivations about the research topic that I was interested with

title: Buddy Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: Graduatorie svolta in base ad esami svolti in precedenza, conoscenza della lingua inglese gradita, obbligatoria disponibilità di svolgere il numero di ore stabilito. Assegnazione mediante conferenza con piattaforma zoom. Ambiente rilassato
Interview Questions: sarai in rado di garantire tutte le ore?

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: The interview is held by three Professors of the department you applied for. The interview consists in a short presentation about your plan for your past studies, the reasons why you want to get a PhD and how you plan your research activity.
Interview Questions: How would you plan your research work in these three years?

title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was very fast. The first interview was inside the university with some professors who asked me about my future intentions, passions and technical questions related to my PhD experience.
Interview Questions: How does it work a Dual Clutch Transmissions

title: Studente Laureato Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: i test d'ingresso comprendono domande di matematica-fisica e comprensione verbale. I test possono sostenersi più volte durante l'anno fino a settembre. La difficoltà dei test è sempre la stessa. Si supera il test se raggiungi almeno il 50% di risposte corrette
Interview Questions: test scritto di matematica fisica e comprensione verbale

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: The process consists in two phases, the first one is an online procedure where you are requested to submit your full CV (in a provided format), and select 10 to 15 publications (the number varies according to the sector) that will be evaluated. After that, the candidates have to undergo an interview where they explain the reserach field, the originality and innovativity of their findings, the plan for future research activities. Also an important plus is past teaching experience, and project management.
Interview Questions: Select 3 representative publications and use them to explain your research path

title: Student Collaborator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: You are scheduled to have an interview with many other students. So you might have to wait before others finish up their interview. The interview is in general taken in two languages at least. English and Italian. They check your fluency with those languages and ask you to tell them if you speak any other languages.
Interview Questions: How many languages do I speak and how good am I with public relations.

title: Librarian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was only a selection based upon grades and university CFU. It was supported by EDISU Piemonte. At the end of the process a chart was compiled and published online
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Ph D Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin)
Interview Descriptions: The secretary staff checked out the past course work performance and research experiences for screening purpose. Then the department arranged some meeting with professors, talking about various research topics and possible funding sources.
Interview Questions:
Why you're going to pursue a Ph.D
What you are gonna fo after you got the Ph.D

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: After my MSc, I applied online for a funded PhD position in the department of mechanical engineering at Politecnico di Torino. About 3 months later, I was shortlisted for an interview. The panel mostly wanted to know about my academic record and also discuss the motivational statement that I submitted online during the application process. Just know your stuff and why you want to carry out research and you should be fine.
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to do a PhD?
Tell me what you did in your MSc thesis?
Who did you work with during that time?
Which research group are you interested in?

title: PhD Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: You can answer to a public call by submitting your cv and other documents through an online form. Then if you get selected you are invited to attend an interview, face to face if you are in Turin, or Skype if you are foreigner.
Interview Questions: The asked me to talk about my previous experiences that I mentioned on my CV.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin)
Interview Descriptions:
Hiring Process: Public call, Interview, Public Ranking

Interview: Background, Technical questions
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Jan 2012
Interview Descriptions: Based on your experience and graduate scores and nothing else. If you are oriented to research and you want to work in an specific project they are working on, you will be hired
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Politecnico di Torino (Turin) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: We submit for open positions and then they choose the one to interview. It can be a Skype interview or personal basing on availability. Then the remaining process is done by the secretary for preparing the nulla osta which is considered as the work permit.
Interview Questions: previous research related questions and how can I tackle the current job duties.
